page.title: 20EVENTS-FIRE ENGINE CRASHES
page.content: {EVENTS { }FIRE ENGINE CRASHES IN GOTHAM Last year a fire engine skidded and crashed in the middle of our village, when it was on its way to put out a fire which had started on the hills just outside the village. Two boys at the school heard the fire engine coming.They looked round and saw the fire engine skid into a wall, crushing a Rover in the process. The fire engine turned onto its side and petrol began to leak from its tank.The fire- men clambered out and fortunately they were unhurt. There was glass all over the road and so the traffic had to be re-directed through the side streets of the village. A crane had to be summoned to tow the fire engine away.As it moved along the road the number plate fell off, and was later found on the school field.
